author: glenn
msg: Basic HTTP Authentication was broken with Apache/JServ, it would return
status 500 because no content was being sent with the status 401.
Added output of a Not Authorized page to basicAuthHandler.

author: glenn
msg: Moved creation of jasper.jar and webserver.jar to tomcat target so
that these can get built without building the entire distriburion.

author: rubys
msg: Roll forward a change from 3.2 => eliminate dependency on deprecated
support file copying by the Ant javac taskdef.

author: jiricka
msg: It is impossible to use JSP tag libraries without web.xml
On Windows, compilation of a JSP which uses a tab library throws NPE if there is no web.xml for the web application.

author: jiricka
